name: ocher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a yellowish-orange color, or a substance obtained from earth that is used for giving this color to paints

having a yellowish-orange color: In the distance a few hills and mountains in ocher colourscolors were starting to appear. The building has ocher yellow walls and green tiled roofs.
More examplesFewer examplesThe room was decorated in deep reds, terracotta, and ocher yellow.First you drive through the desert-like province of Jaen, with its blanket of olive trees and ocher dust.A sea of white papers fluttered over the ocher sand.
